roleset.name: persuade by flattery or promises
roleset.note: CAJOLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cajole' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 59. (from cajole.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ARG0
example.text: Dingxiang persuaded and cajoled , but in the end she was beaten and kicked by Zhang Sheng .

example.name: Corpus Example: ULA Written
example.text: Stephanopoulos skillfully bullies and cajoles him-1 into *PRO*-1 keepingquiet.
